text: RT @theferocity: When I was a teenager, I told my mother I was determined to publish one of my poems in the New Yorker. It was the only magazine I knew at the time that published "real" poems. So much has happened. This week, a poem about my mother is in the New Yorker. https://t.co/Cx4d5EEK6M
